content.p: Knowledge Exchange and Impact Awards 2024 Thursday 1 February 2024 East Midlands Conference Centre The Knowledge Exchange and Impact Awards recognise and celebrate KE and impact arising from all research disciplines across the University of Nottingham. This will be the fourth Knowledge Exchange and Impact Awards, with categories covering KE and impact (commercial, societal, policy) in each faculty, a Rising Star award and a Vice Chancellorâ€™s award. The awards will raise awareness of the exceptional work across the university and celebrate Knowledge Exchange projects on the pathway to success as well as those projects that are more advanced. Showcase your success by entering, or nominate a deserving colleague. The awards provide an exciting opportunity to celebrate your achievements with your colleagues and learn more about the fantastic impact across the university. Winners will be announced at an awards ceremony at the East Midlands Conference Centre on Thursday 1 February 2024. Entry deadline: Monday 16 October 2023 Nominations announced: Wednesday 1 November 2023 Awards ceremony: Thursday 1 February 2024 Visit the KE Hub for more details Need some help? Email the event team Awards evening programme Get in touch: research.innovation@nottingham.ac.uk Jubilee Conference Centre Jubilee Campus Triumph Road Nottingham, NG8 1DH
